Orlando.Lake Adair\u2013Lake Concord Historic Di:
The Lake Adair–Lake Concord Historic District is a U.S. historic district located to the east of Spring Lake and to the west of the Lake Aldair and Lake Concord in Orlando, Florida. The district is roughly bounded by Golfview Street, Edgewater Circuit, Alameda Street, and Peachtree Road.
It was added to the National Register of Historic Places on December 30, 2011.
